comments: Ramanujan theta functions: f(q) (see A121373), phi(q) (A000122), psi(q) (A010054), chi(q) (A000700).
links: M. Somos, Introduction to Ramanujan theta functions
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics,Ramanujan Theta Functions
formula: Expansion of q * f(q^2) * f(q^7) / (chi(q) * chi(q^14)) + 2 * psi(q^4) * phi(-q^7) * chi(-q^14) / chi(-q^2) - 2 in powers of q where phi(), psi(), chi(), f() are Ramanujan theta functions. - _Michael Somos_, Jun 22 2011a(n) is multiplicative with a(p^e) = (1 - q^e) / (1 - q) where q = p * kronecker( -14, p). - _Michael Somos_, Jun 22 2011Dirichlet g.f.: zeta(s) * L(chi,s) where chi(n) = kronecker( -14, n).
mathematica: a[ n_] := If[ n < 1, 0, Sum[ KroneckerSymbol[ -14, d], { d, Divisors[ n]}]] (* _Michael Somos_, Jun 22 2011 *)
prog: (PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, sumdiv( n, d, kronecker( -14, d)))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 22 2011 */(PARI) {a(n) = if( n<1, 0, direuler( p=2, n, 1 / ((1 - X) * (1 - kronecker( -14, p) * X)))[n])} /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 22 2011 */(PARI) {a(n) = local(A); if( n<0, 0, A = x * O(x^n); polcoeff( 2 * (eta(x^7 + A) * eta(x^8 + A))^2 / (eta(x^2 + A) * eta(x^28 + A)) - 2 + x * eta(x + A) * eta(x^4 + A)^4 * eta(x^14 + A)^4 * eta(x^56 + A) / (eta(x^2 + A)^3* eta(x^7 + A) * eta(x^8 + A) * eta(x^28 + A)^3), n))} /* _Michael Somos_, Jun 22 2011 */
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Dec 11 1999
